author: Special Correspondent
text:
Eight persons were killed and 40 injured in an accident when a Gujarat State transport bus turned turtle in Saurashtra region on Saturday. This is the second accident involving a State transport bus.

Chief Minister Anandiben Patel announced a compensation of Rs 4 lakh each to the kin of those died while directing the administration to ensure that the injured were given best treatment.
title: 8 killed in Gujarat bus accident
